# init(tracking:sceneUnderstanding:)

**Initializer**

Creates a configuration with a set of anchor capabilities and scene understanding capabilities.

## Declaration

```swift
init(tracking anchorCapabilities: Set<SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration.AnchorCapability> = [], sceneUnderstanding: Set<SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration.SceneUnderstandingCapability> = [])
```

## Parameters

- **anchorCapabilities**: The set of anchor capabilities to run with a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SpatialTrackingSession].
- **sceneUnderstanding**: The set of scene understanding capabilities to run with a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SpatialTrackingSession].
title: init(tracking:sceneUnderstanding:)
